publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4071 Jim Tolson: Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Dunfermline High School on forming a diabetes support group; believes that this is the first group to be set up in a school environment; acknowledges the work of the group to raise the awareness of fellow pupils and teachers to ensure that they are fully aware of symptoms and effects of diabetes and raising awareness in the wider community, and further congratulates the group for taking part in fundraising activities for Diabetes UK.
S3M-4071 Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group (lodged on 6 May 2009) Mike Pringle*

S3M-4071 Jim Tolson: Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Dunfermline High School on forming a diabetes support group; believes that this is the first group to be set up in a school environment; acknowledges the work of the group to raise the awareness of fellow pupils and teachers to ensure that they are fully aware of symptoms and effects of diabetes and raising awareness in the wider community, and further congratulates the group for taking part in fundraising activities for Diabetes UK. Supported by: Mike Pringle
S3M-4071 Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group (lodged on 6 May 2009) Christine Grahame*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Elizabeth Smith*, Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*
S3M-4071 Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group (lodged on 6 May 2009) Karen Whitefield*, Ken Macintosh*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4071 Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group (lodged on 6 May 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-4071 Dunfermline High School Diabetes Support Group (lodged on 6 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
